actions.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).

description: An amendment to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by $9,518,000; reduce funding for the Departmental Administration account by $20,000,000; and increase funding for the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $22,586,500.
purpose: Amendment reduces funding for the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by $9,518,000; reduces funding for the Departmental Administration account by $20,000,000; and increases funding for the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $22,586,500.
